Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Cicero
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily in both directions rerouted via Division, Kostner Augusta, Cicero and Division due to police activity near Division/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#70 Division buses are temporarily in both directions rerouted via Division, Kostner Augusta, Cicero and Division due to police activity near Division/Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: 29 State rr NB via State, Washington, Mchgn, Rand, Columbus, Illinois; SB via Grand, Fairbanks-Columbus, Ontario, Mchgn, Rand, due to blockage nr Mchgn/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Washington, Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, Illinois, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Grand, Fairbanks-Columbus, Ontario, Michigan, Randolph, then resume their normal route on State.

Allow extra travel time.

How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark and #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Northbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Washington, Michigan, Ontario, Dearborn then resume their normal.
